All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arrangement
    This class represents the data in the table arrangement create table `arrangement`( id int primary key auto_increment, name varchar(64) not null, start_date Date not null, end_date Date not null, `repeat` int not null, start_time Time not null, end_time Time not null ) engine=InnoDB default charset=utf8;
    ArrangementDAO
    This interface determines all operations on the table arrangement in database
    ArrangementDAOImpl  
    BaseDAO
    This class is the basic class of all data access object class
    Character
    This class represents the data in the table character create table `character`( id int primary key auto_increment, name varchar(64) not null, area varchar(32), school varchar(128) ) engine=InnoDB default charset=utf8;
    CharacterDAO
    This interface determines all operations on the table character in database
    CharacterDAOImpl  
    ExortApplication
    This class is the main class
    ExortController
    This controller class is in charge of all non-restful requests
    ExortGetController
    This controller class is in charge of all get requests in restful form
    ExortPostController
    This controller class is in charge of all post requests in restful form
    GitUtil
    This class provides with some static methods to assist in git operations
    MySQLUtil
    This class provides with some static methods to assist in MySQL operations
    Participation
    This class represents the data in the table participation create table `participation`() character_id int, arrangement_id int, primary key(character_id, arrangement_id), foreign key cid(character_id) references `character`(id) on delete no action on update no action, foreign key aid(arrangement_id) references `arrangement`(id) on delete no action on update no action ) engine=InnoDB default charset=utf8;
    ParticipationDAO
    This interface determines all operations on the table participation in database
    ParticipationDAOImpl  
    ParticipationWithContent
    This class have the same meaning with Participation, combining all data into a string together
    SettingsDAO
    This interface determines all operations on the table settings in database
    SettingsDAOImpl  
    SettingsPair
    This class represents the data in the table settings create table `settings`( setting_key varchar(64) primary key, setting_value varchar(128) not null ) engine=InnoDB default charset=utf8;
